column1: Funeral services will be 1:00 p.m. Wednesday
column3: 2015 at Sand Spring Baptist Church with full police honors. Bro. Noal Cotton Jr. and Bro.Jamie Chesser will officiate. Burial will follow in the Lawrenceburg Cemetery. Visitation will be Monday 3-8 p.m.
